# Elixir Configuration Guidelines
> Avoid using application configuration for libraries. Libraries should expose configuration options via function arguments or initialization functions.

## Resources
* [Anti-Patterns: Using app config for libs](https://hexdocs.pm/elixir/main/anti-patterns.html#using-app-config-for-libs): Official Elixir documentation explaining why libraries shouldn't rely on application config.
* [Config](https://hexdocs.pm/elixir/Config.html): Hexdocs for the Elixir `Config` module, used for reading application configuration.
